name: WallHax
description:
After being kidnapped by a whale, you must find a way to escape the colorful maze in which you are trapped. You must hurry before he has a chance to do anything to you. This is my first game and I wanted to make something really bizarre and different. This weird little game is what I ended up with. You might want a pencil and a piece of paper to help through certain mazes. This game might not be suited for young children.

v1.1:

  • Fixed an issue that caused parts of the whalicorn to be invisible.
  • Made the whalicorn's hair a little less crazy looking.
  • Added a pause menu that lets you quit to the main menu and quit from the game entirely.
  • Changed the movement to be slightly more responsive and not have that feeling of input delay.

v1.2:

  • Fixed the pause menu. Before, you couldn't click any of the buttons.
